searchmethod: termsearch <- function(lookup, terms) {stringr::str_detect(lookup, stringr::regex(paste(terms, collapse = '|'), ignore_case = TRUE))}; initial <- dplyr::filter(DATA, termsearch(COLUMN, SEARCHTERMS)); excluded <- dplyr::filter(initial, termsearch(COLUMN, EXCLUSIONTERMS); final <- dplyr::setdiff(inital, excluded)

searchterms: [X]Hyperkinetic reaction of childhood or adolescence NOS
ADD - Attention deficit disorder without hyperactivity
ADHD - Attention deficit disorder with hyperactivity
Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, predominantly inattentive type
DAMP - Deficits in attention motor control and perception
Deficits in attention motor control and perception
